verse: भद्रं कर्णेभिः शृणुयाम देवा भद्रं पश्येमाक्षभिर्यजत्राः स्थिरैरङ्गैस्तुष्टुवाः सस्तनूभिर्व्यशेम देवहितं यदायुः
meaning: जो इंद्रिय मन बुद्धि से सदा मेरी भक्ति करता है वो मुझको प्राप्त कर सकता है
meaning-gpt: Meaning: "May we listen with our ears, O Gods, to what is auspicious..."Explanation: This verse begins with an invocation to the deities, requesting them to grant us the ability to hear or listen to what is auspicious or beneficial. The words "bhadram karnebhih" emphasize the importance of using our faculty of hearing in a positive and productive way, seeking knowledge, wisdom, and uplifting teachings. The verse sets the tone for seeking spiritual knowledge and understanding in the following verses.
